p: A scenario of an effective EMS transportation, which is called the sequential-conveyance method in an MCI, is designed to shorten the transportation time and distance and to articulate with prehospital emergency care. Furthermore, an alternative concept of a mobile emergency medical center (MEMC) is introduced to integrate the EMS experts and the medics, so to act cooperatively and systematically. This MEMC is responsive to calamities and fully prepared to offer the emergency medical care close to the disaster area.
